data.text: O God, nɨ akam dukuagh pura ganan markɨ.
Nɨ gan, nɨn apaniba me mɨdoroziba fori da otifi.
Me nɨn gumazamiziba paza me damuasa muegha me bagha gara iti.
Kantrin kaba Israel abɨnasa uari akuvagha,
Ikɨzir kabanang: Idomia, Ismaelia, Moapia, Hakria, ko
Asirian kantri uaghan men aven ghugha Moapia ko, Amonian akura.
O God, nɨ faragha Midiania gamizɨ moghɨn nɨ me damigh.
Nɨ dughiar kamɨn Endorɨn nguibamɨn aning gasɨghasɨghizɨ,
Nɨ faragha Orep ko, Sep gamizɨ moghɨn,
O God, nɨ uan amɨnir gavgavimɨn me giveraghtɨ,
Avim ruariba ko mɨghsɨabar isia akara zui moghɨn,
Kamaghɨra, nɨ amozir ekiam amadaghtɨ a izɨ men agɨraghtɨ me aregh.
Nan ifongiam, nɨ me abɨraghtɨ me bar atiatingigh aghumsigh kamaghɨra ikɨ.
Nɨ kamagh damightɨ me guizbangɨra ganigh fogh suam,
